email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your recent inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. I have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for this route. She’s a 150,000 DWT tanker with an LOA of 280 meters. My starting freight quote is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The MV Ocean Star sounds like a good fit, but the freight rate is a bit on the higher side. Given the current market, I was hoping for something closer to $49.50 per metric ton. Also, could you confirm the laycan? We’re looking at a loading window between October 15th and 20th. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your position on the rate. Let me check with the owner and see if we can adjust it. Regarding the laycan, October 15th to 20th works for the MV Ocean Star. I’ll get back to you shortly with a revised quote. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Revised Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, good news! The owner has agreed to lower the rate to $49.75 per metric ton. This is the best I can do given the current market conditions. Let me know if this works for you. Also, demurrage is set at $20,000 per day, pro rata. Looking forward to your confirmation. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised quote. $49.75 per metric ton is acceptable. Let’s proceed with the MV Ocean Star for the October 15th to 20th laycan. Please send over the charter party for review. Also, confirm the demurrage terms. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Charter Party and Demurrage Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that the terms work for you. I’ve attached the draft charter party for your review. Demurrage is confirmed at $20,000 per day, pro rata, as discussed. Let me know if you need any adjustments. Looking forward to finalizing this. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Party and Demurrage Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, the charter party looks good. No adjustments needed. Let’s proceed to finalize the agreement. Thanks for your help throughout this process. Cheers, John.
